data.actual_result: Trigger two toasts, "Message must be 2000 characters or less" and "Unable to preprocess file", even though there's no file at all
data.expected_result: Should trigger only one toast, "Message must be 2000 characters or less"
data.short_description: Attempting to share a 2k+ character-long text will trigger a toast referring to files
data.steps_to_repro: - Share a text into discord, for example a link - Fill the comment box so it's more than 2000 characters - Hit Send
